name: product_reviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_amazon_data.
Tool description: Fast and Simple product searches, data and reviews on Amazon.com in real-time.
API description: Fetches and paginates through product reviews on Amazon for a given product.

asin.description: Product ASIN for which to get reviews.

query.description: Find reviews matching a search query.

sort_by.description:
Return reviews in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `TOP_REVIEWS`

**Allowed values:** `TOP_REVIEWS, MOST_RECENT`

verified_purchases_only.description: Only return reviews by reviewers who made a verified purchase.

page_size.description: Number of reviews to return per page. Allowed values range from `1` to `20`. Default is `10`.

page.description: Page number of results to return. Default is `1`.

star_rating.description:
Only return reviews with a specific star rating.

**Default:** `ALL`

**Allowed values:** `ALL, 5_STARS, 4_STARS, 3_STARS, 2_STARS, 1_STARS, POSITIVE, CRITICAL`

images_or_videos_only.description: Only return reviews containing images and / or videos.

country.description: Marketplace country, language, and currency. Default is `US`. Allowed values are `US`, `AU`, `BR`, `CA`, `CN`, `FR`, `DE`, `IN`, `IT`, `MX`, `NL`, `SG`, `ES`, `TR`, `AE`, `GB`, `JP`.
